list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an agreement or a settlement of a dispute that is reached by each side making concessions.
settle a dispute by mutual concession.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the end we compromised and deferred the issue
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuối cùng, chúng tôi đã thỏa hiệp và trì hoãn vấn đề

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: accept standards that are lower than is desirable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we were not prepared to compromise on safety
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã không chuẩn bị để thỏa hiệp về an toàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring into disrepute or danger by indiscreet, foolish, or reckless behavior.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: situations in which his troops could be compromised
